resources.string: You have pressed \'Check\', do you want to undo the \'Check\' or the last pair of digits?
No more combinations possible - press Check
No more combinations possible - you have won
Do you want random numbers or the digits from 1–18?
Not possible. The buttons cannot be bigger
Not possible. The buttons cannot be smaller
At the beginning you have the digits from the numbers 1–18. The difference from 1–19 is, that here are two digits (1 and 9) missing at the end.
At the beginning you have the digits from the numbers 1–19. The difference from 1–18 is, that here are two digits (1 and 9) more at the end.
This mode is like 1–18. The difference is, that this mode is much faster. The help comes within some seconds and it immediately checks if there are still some combinations possible.

This mode is like 1–18. The difference from this mode to others is, that in this mode you can not clear lines with the "clear" button, but you can clear columns. If you have a whole column where all numbers are crossed out, you can press the "clear" button and all these crossed out numbers are removed. The other numbers will change their position to fill the gaps. With this you can use the "clear" button tactically to change the game.\nRECOMMENDED: It is better to not use the "clear" button to remove single gaps, if you have only one or two lines. This could make the game even harder than expected ;)

This mode is only available, if you have finished 1–18 or 1–19 once.
The numbers at the beginning are created randomly and they are different after every restart!
While you're playing the time is running in the background.
Finish the game as fast as possible and beat your record!
You can find your record at Statistics -> Total statistics!
Please log in with Google Play Games (Click on controller on main menu)
In this game you have to click neighbouring (vertically or continuously) pairs of digits. But you can only cross out the same numbers or those that give a total of 10.
The following picture shows how it works: \n
- On the left the two 1, cause they are above each other
- In the second line the two 1, cause they are side by side
- The 9 in the first and the 1 in the second line, cause they are in the next line and nothing is between
\nIf some numbers are crossed out, you can skip them like shown here:
\nOr like shown here with the 8 and 2:
If there are no more numbers which fit together you have to click the \'Check\' button, the button with the +:
\nThen all numbers, which you could not cross out, will be written behind the existing numbers:
The game is finished, when all numbers are crossed out. Check next page to learn which numbers you can cross out. Games can take very much time. They often take many hours.
\nFor further information about the modes press the small \'i\' in the \'Choose the mode\' screen. You have to finish the 1–18 or 1–19 mode once to unlock the \'Time duel\' mode.
\nThe game saves and loads automatically. If you want to restart press the \'restart\' button ingame.

\nIn the settings you can switch the ingame-notifications (e.g. \'Successful\', \'Not Successful\') and the notification-bar on and off. Furthermore you can change the language and the colors of the background and the numbers.
The \'Check\' button needs to be clicked if no more combinations are possible. It writes the remaining numbers behind the existing ones (see tab: Check).\n
The \'Undo\' button undoes the last move.\n
The \'Clear\' button deletes all empty lines.\n

The \'Help\' button (only) shows a combination which is possible at the moment. Persistent clicking on the button is not necessarily removing all numbers. It is only clickable after some seconds to prevent constant clicking. Press short for complete help and long for just a hint if there are still combinations available.\n
The \'Restart\' button can be used to restart the current game.
Your smartphone does not support this share function. You can take a screenshot instead.
The game is not solvable anymore. Start a new game with \'Restart\'.\n
\nHow good are you?\nDownload \'Numbers Game - Numberama\' from the Play Store and show it!
combinations. How good are you?\nDownload \'Numbers Game - Numberama\' from the Play Store and show it!
Position of ingame buttons: top / bottom
Position of ingame buttons: top / bottom
The \'Auto clear\' could have a minor impact on the performance, if you have many numbers and rows ingame
Choose your colors by clicking the color next to the specified item. The chosen color is highlighted, the others are transparent.
If you enjoy using Numbers Game, please take a moment to rate it. \nThanks for your support!
